Name: Align Telescope
Description: Tap the screen to toggle the telescope and find the planet displayed in the lower right corner

Name: Chart Course
Description: Tap and drag the ship along the grid line.

Name: Clear Asteroids
Description: Tap and destroy 20 asteroids.

Name: Empty Garbage
Description: Pull and hold the lever.

Name: Fill Canisters
Description: Tap and drag down the canisters in succession

Name: Fix Weather Node
Locations: (1) Outside(C, E, NE, NW, S, SW, W). (2) Laboratory
Description: Drag the yellow light to the opposite end

Name: Fix Wiring
Locations: Decontamination(N), Electrical, Laboratory, Laboratory, O2, Office
Description: Step 1, 2, 3: Connect wires of the same color.

Name: Fuel Engine
Description: Step 1, 3: Fill the gas container by pressing and holding the button. Step 2, 4: Fill the gas tank by pressing and holding the button.

Name: Insert Keys
Description: Insert a key and turn it

Name: Inspect Sample
Description: Press the 'Start' button and wait. After the countdown ends, push the button below the red sample.

Name: Monitor Tree
Description: Move the bars to align with the grid lines

Name: Open Waterways
Description: Step 1, 2, 3: Spin the wheel and wait until the water gauge fills.

Name: Reboot Wifi
Description: Pull down the red lever. After the countdown ends, pull the lever up.

Name: Record Temperature
Description: Press the arrows to adjust the number on the log screen so that it matches the number on the reading screen

Name: Repair Drill
Description: Tap the warning markers repeatedly until all markers disappear

Name: Replace Water Jug
Description: Step 1, 2: Press and hold the red button and fill the water jug

Name: Scan Boarding Pass
Description: Tap the boarding pass to pull it up, tap again to flip it over, then drag it above the reader.

Name: Start Reactor
Description: Press the buttons in the exact sames order as the blue squares show on the left display.

Name: Sort Artifacts
Description: Store all artifacts in the case

Name: Submit Scan
Description: Stand on the platform and scan yourself.

Name: Swipe Card
Description: Use the card in the wallet and swipe it across the sensor.

Name: Unlock Manifolds
Description: Press the buttons in numerical order.

Name: Upload Data
Locations: (1) Electrical, O2, Office, Specimen Room, Weapons. (2) Communications
Description: Step 1: Press the download button. Step 2: Press the upload button.
